person.persName: James Mason (Hancock County, KY, farmer & home guard soldier )

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer, businessman, and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Mason. Father of Vertura E. Mason, Richard W. Mason, Mary R. Mason, Kate Mason, Robert Mason, Mike Mason, Margret Mason, Thomas Mason, Henry Mason, James Mason, Mannie Mason, and Charles Mason. Founding member of the Hancock Pond Draining Company in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Hancock County in 1860. Served in the Hancock County Home Guard in June 1861.
